hero.title: Premium Independent Houses for Rent in Sector 58 Gurugram
description: Sector 58 Gurugram is a well-developed residential locality known for its premium surroundings, smooth connectivity, and peaceful living environment. Tenants searching for a house for rent in Sector 58 Gurugram are drawn to this area because of its proximity to Golf Course Extension Road, Sohna Road, and major corporate hubs. The sector offers a balanced lifestyle where residents can enjoy modern infrastructure while staying well-connected to offices, schools, and shopping destinations.

Independent houses in Sector 58 provide spacious layouts, privacy, and a calm neighborhood atmosphere. The area is surrounded by reputed schools, hospitals, daily convenience stores, and green open spaces, making it suitable for families and professionals alike. Choosing a house for rent in Sector 58 Gurugram is ideal for tenants who value comfort, connectivity, and a high-quality residential experience.

faqs.question: Is Sector 58 Gurugram a good place to rent a house?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 58 is a premium residential area with excellent connectivity and amenities.

faqs.question: What types of houses are available for rent in Sector 58?
faqs.answer: Independent houses ranging from 4 Marla to 14 Marla are commonly available.

faqs.question: Is Sector 58 suitable for family living?
faqs.answer: Yes, the area has schools, hospitals, parks, and daily convenience stores nearby.

faqs.question: Are furnished houses available in Sector 58 Gurugram?
faqs.answer: Both furnished and semi-furnished houses are available depending on the owner.

faqs.question: What is the average rent in Sector 58 Gurugram?
faqs.answer: Rental prices vary based on plot size and condition but are competitive for the location.

faqs.question: How is connectivity from Sector 58?
faqs.answer: Sector 58 is well-connected via Golf Course Extension Road and Sohna Road.

faqs.question: Are bachelors allowed to rent houses in Sector 58?
faqs.answer: Some landlords allow bachelors, while others prefer families.

faqs.question: Is Sector 58 a safe area for tenants?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is a well-planned and secure residential locality.
